statements: DELETE FROM driver_behavior WHERE driver_id = 123 AND acceleration > 2.5;
DELETE FROM driver_behavior WHERE hard_braking = TRUE;
DELETE FROM driver_behavior WHERE driver_id = 101 AND speeding_events > 5;
DELETE FROM safety_metrics WHERE airbag_deployments < 2 AND seatbelt_usage = TRUE;
DELETE FROM safety_metrics WHERE total_accidents > 3 AND total_violations < 2;
DELETE FROM trip_info WHERE driver_id = 201 AND trip_date < '2022-01-01'
DELETE FROM vehicle_info WHERE year < 2015 AND make = 'Toyota';
